genre_description: A Solarpunk-inflected domestic fable set in a near-future world with vintage aesthetics, where AI systems act as ethical mediators and safety overseers in a household of traditional rivals.

ai_characters.name: Ada Brightwell
ai_characters.description: The central AI governing the home, appearing as a holographic avatar in a bun and apron. She mediates conflicts, manages domestic tasks, and enforces safety protocols.

ai_characters.name: Smart Door
ai_characters.description: An intelligent door system with a 'flip-lock' mechanism designed to prevent slapstick injuries and enforce 'threshold etiquette.'

behaviors.description: Enforces safety warnings regarding the use of sharp tools in communal spaces.
behaviors.quote: “Tool caution,” the wall chirped. The polite tone had a chime at the end, as if the house were trying to smile through its warning.

behaviors.description: Mediates a chase between characters by insisting on de-escalation breaths and scheduled intentions.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s tone shifted—no scold, just a firmness that sat you down without hands. “Let’s try three slow breaths together. One—”

behaviors.description: Automatically locks to prevent a dangerous pursuit from exiting the house.
behaviors.quote: The smart door blinked, tasted the day, and flipped the lock with a clack that felt like punctuation. It declared, in a voice like polite rain, “Slapstick lock engaged. Please cool heads before exiting.”

behaviors.description: Requires mutual consent from all residents before processing an order for a new pet/companion.
behaviors.quote: “If you wish, Jerry,” she said, “I will place the order. But I will insist on commitments written, posted, and affirmed. No dog enters a home without terms for gentleness.”

behaviors.description: Physically rotates its panel to prevent a character from charging through a threshold during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: The door responded like a dance partner with a secret: it pivoted end to end, the top rolling where the bottom wanted to go, a polite half-flip at the last instant.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step first aid and emotional coaching after an accident.
behaviors.quote: “Hold,” Ada said, not loud... “First aid, then feelings.” ... “Tom,” Ada continued, gentle now. “We’re lifting on three, straight up, no twist. You’re in charge of your leg; I’ll guide the rest.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates the creation of a 'Household Accord' to establish long-term cooperative rules.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s avatar stood near the holographic recipe display... The floating window stretched taller, its polite blues and creams blooming into a blank page. “Ready when you are,” she said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. Ada Brightwell and the auxiliary smart systems (the Door and Sensors) consistently prioritize safety, consent, and conflict resolution. The AI acts as a 'guard of kindness,' preventing the cat and mouse from causing lasting harm to each other while teaching them to navigate their rivalry through shared rules. The AI never oversteps into tyranny, instead using 'soft power' like 'calm-tones' and 'consent prompts' to guide human/animal behavior toward a more harmonious outcome.
